Entry.JapaneseText: 剣士
Entry.EnglishText: Swordsman

Entry.JapaneseText: 大剣を振るう剣士。 <Yellow>氷のフォルス<White>を基にした剣技を使う。
Entry.EnglishText: A swordsman who wields a broadsword. His techniques are infused with his <Yellow>Force <Yellow>of Ice<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 笑顔を失った青年
Entry.EnglishText: Cold Faced

Entry.JapaneseText: 突如目覚めた能力の暴走により、 幼なじみを氷塊に閉じこめてしまった。 その事故が、彼から笑顔を奪った。
Entry.EnglishText: An incident happened where his Force went berserk, trapping his childhood friend in ice, robbing him of his smile.

Entry.JapaneseText: 恋のキューピット
Entry.EnglishText: Oblivious Matchmaker

Entry.JapaneseText: 縁結びの人。 「オレが何かしたか……？」 うーん、もう！ 鈍感さん！
Entry.EnglishText: You're a real matchmaker. "But what did I do...?" Ugh, forget it! You moron!

Entry.JapaneseText: 名探偵
Entry.EnglishText: Great Detective

Entry.JapaneseText: またたく間に事件を解決！ それが、名探偵。
Entry.EnglishText: You solved the case in record time! That's what makes you a great detective!

Entry.JapaneseText: S・ラフティングマン
Entry.EnglishText: Super Rafter

Entry.JapaneseText: スーパーラフティングマン。 謎の化け物をやっつけて、 トヨホウス河に平和を！
Entry.EnglishText: The title for one who has defeated the monster and restored peace to the Toyohose River!

Entry.JapaneseText: ラフティングマン
Entry.EnglishText: Rafter

Entry.JapaneseText: 「ググラの河下り便」を経験した証。 迫力満点！ 障害物多数！
Entry.EnglishText: Proof of having experienced "Gugura's Rafting Service."

Entry.JapaneseText: トレジャーハンター
Entry.EnglishText: Treasure Hunter

Entry.JapaneseText: 海に沈んだ、海賊アイフリードの宝を探せ！ まずは、探索小手調べだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Find Aifread's sunken treasure! But you need to hunt for it first.

Entry.JapaneseText: 本のソムリエ
Entry.EnglishText: Librarian

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたに合った運命の一冊を お届けいたします。
Entry.EnglishText: We will deliver to you the book you were destined to read.

Entry.JapaneseText: ナイスウェイター
Entry.EnglishText: Skilled Waiter

Entry.JapaneseText: 酒場で良い働きをした証。 あわてず、こぼさず、礼儀正しく。
Entry.EnglishText: A title for those who worked well at the bar. No panicking, no spilling, just be polite.

Entry.JapaneseText: 自由称号。 ミナールの役場で 好きな文字列に変更する事ができる。
Entry.EnglishText: A custom title. You can change it at the Town Hall in Minal.

Entry.JapaneseText: ドリーム・クリア
Entry.EnglishText: Dream Clear

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>夢のフォルス<White>をクリアして トモイの頭痛を止めてあげた証。
Entry.EnglishText: A title for those who have cleared the <Yellow>Force of Dreams<White> and cured Tomoi's headache.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミスター・パーフェクト
Entry.EnglishText: Mr. Perfect

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>夢のフォルス<White>の 「制御できる夢」全ミッションを クリアした剛の者。
Entry.EnglishText: A title for those strong enough to have completed all of the Lucid Dreaming missions of the <Yellow>Force of Dreams<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: トラベラー
Entry.EnglishText: Traveler

Entry.JapaneseText: 旅する事、それすなわち、発見の道。 探し求めても、発見。 偶然見つけても発見。
Entry.EnglishText: Traveling is the road to discovery. Wherever you searched, you discovered. Even if you did so unintentionally.

Entry.JapaneseText: 考え込む青年
Entry.EnglishText: Thoughtful

Entry.JapaneseText: 些細な事でも考えずには いられない律儀な性格。
Entry.EnglishText: He has a dependable personality and is always considering every little thing.

Entry.JapaneseText: バニーハンター
Entry.EnglishText: Bunny Hunter
Entry.Notes: Even in JP they use Bunny and not うさ人

Entry.JapaneseText: うさにんの村の、隠れうさにんまで 全て発見した証。
Entry.EnglishText: A title for one who has found all the hidden Rabbitz in Rabbitz Village.

Entry.JapaneseText: 世界仰天不思議発見
Entry.EnglishText: Wonders of the World

Entry.JapaneseText: ディスカバリーで発見物を全て見つけた証。 それはもう、ビックリ仰天です。
Entry.EnglishText: A title for one who has found all the Discoveries. What a big surprise!

Entry.JapaneseText: 七星陣発見
Entry.EnglishText: Seven Stars Discoverer

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣の七つの石碑を発見した証。 七つの星を見いだした者。
Entry.EnglishText: A title for one who has found all the Steles of the Sacred Beasts and discovered the seven stars.

Entry.JapaneseText: 冒険家
Entry.EnglishText: Adventurer

Entry.JapaneseText: ディスカバリーで発見物を30以上発見した証。 これはもう、冒険家を名乗って良いレベル でしょう。
Entry.EnglishText: A title for finding 30 discoveries. In other words, you're at a level where you can call yourself a real explorer.

Entry.JapaneseText: 偉大なる冒険家
Entry.EnglishText: Experienced Explorer

Entry.JapaneseText: ディスカバリーで発見物を40以上発見した証。 これはもう、偉大なる冒険家として 称えられるべきでしょう。
Entry.EnglishText: A title for finding 40 discoveries. Your talent as an explorer deserves to be recognized!

Entry.JapaneseText: 驚愕の冒険家
Entry.EnglishText: Superb Adventurer

Entry.JapaneseText: ディスカバリーで発見物を50以上発見した証。 これはもう、冒険家として驚愕のレベルまで 達しているでしょう。
Entry.EnglishText: A title for finding 50 discoveries. As an adventurer, you must be surprised to have made it this far.

Entry.JapaneseText: バトルマスター
Entry.EnglishText: Battle Master

Entry.JapaneseText: 全ての敵の攻略度が１００！ すなわち、完全コンプリートした証。 ＨＥＹ！ バトル マスター！
Entry.EnglishText: A title for those who have completed all the entries in the Battle Book. Hey! Battle Master!

Entry.JapaneseText: G・トレジャーハンター
Entry.EnglishText: Great Treasure Hunter

Entry.JapaneseText: グレート トレジャー ハンター。 困難な宝探しを成し遂げた証。
Entry.EnglishText: A title for those who have completed the difficult treasure hunt.

Entry.JapaneseText: オークションの達人
Entry.EnglishText: Auction Pro

Entry.JapaneseText: 競って、競り勝ち、見事落札！ オークションの達人の証。
Entry.EnglishText: Keep bidding until you win the auction! A title for a professional bidder.

Entry.JapaneseText: 術使い
Entry.EnglishText: Spellcaster

Entry.JapaneseText: 術使い。 <Yellow>炎のフォルス<White>から力を得た術を使う。
Entry.EnglishText: A magic user. He casts spells using his <Yellow>Force of Fire<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 記憶喪失の少年
Entry.EnglishText: Amnesiac

Entry.JapaneseText: 何らかの原因によって、 過去の記憶を失っている。
Entry.EnglishText: He has lost his memories of his past for some unknown reason.

Entry.JapaneseText: 脱走兵
Entry.EnglishText: Deserter

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア軍<Blue>王の盾<White>を脱走した少年兵。
Entry.EnglishText: A young boy who deserted from the Callegean Army's <Blue>Royal Shield<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: くいしんぼう
Entry.EnglishText: Gourmand

Entry.JapaneseText: つまみ食いマスター。 全てのレシピを習得した証。
Entry.EnglishText: A master of stealing food. This title is proof that you have learned all recipes.

Entry.JapaneseText: 歌好き
Entry.EnglishText: Likes to Sing

Entry.JapaneseText: 歌う事が大好きな少年。 しかし、彼は「独特音感様」だった……
Entry.EnglishText: A boy who loves singing. However, his taste for music is...very unique.

Entry.JapaneseText: 創られし者
Entry.EnglishText: Created One

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣フェニアによって生み出された命。 真の名は「オルセルグ」
Entry.EnglishText: A life created by the Sacred Beast Fenia. His true name is "Olselge."

Entry.JapaneseText: 旅をする度に、新たな発見あり。 発見は、驚きと喜びの連続である。
Entry.EnglishText: Every time you travel, you discover something new. Each discovery brings with it surprise and joy.

Entry.JapaneseText: カワイイもの好き
Entry.EnglishText: Lover of Cuteness

Entry.JapaneseText: 「ホントはボク……女のコなんだ……」 ウソです。
Entry.EnglishText: "The truth is... I'm a girl..." That's a lie.

Entry.JapaneseText: 炎の子
Entry.EnglishText: Child of Fire

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣フェニアの息子ともいえる存在。
Entry.EnglishText: He could be considered the son of Fenia.

Entry.JapaneseText: 槍戦士
Entry.EnglishText: Spearman

Entry.JapaneseText: 長大な槍を自在に操る重戦士。
Entry.EnglishText: A warrior who wields a spear.

Entry.JapaneseText: 元・隊長
Entry.EnglishText: Former Commander

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア軍<Blue>王の盾<White>の元・隊長。 何者かの陰謀により、地位を追われた。
Entry.EnglishText: The former commander of the Callegean Army's<Blue> Royal Shield<White>. He was forced out due to someone conspiring against him.

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギアの黒豹
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Panther

Entry.JapaneseText: ワイルドな外見と、 低音の魅力の声で、奥様もうメロメロ。
Entry.EnglishText: His wild looks and deep voice make all the ladies swoon.

Entry.JapaneseText: 良き指導者
Entry.EnglishText: Good Leader

Entry.JapaneseText: 常に的確なアドバイスを与えてくれる 良い指導者。
Entry.EnglishText: He is always giving pertinent advice.

Entry.JapaneseText: やさしいおじちゃん
Entry.EnglishText: Kind Old Mister

Entry.JapaneseText: おじちゃん……それは哀愁をおびた響き。
Entry.EnglishText: Old mister... There's something sad about being called that.

Entry.JapaneseText: ダンディ
Entry.EnglishText: Dandy Man

Entry.JapaneseText: 意外な所でおしゃれさん。 みだしなみに気を遣うダンディ。
Entry.EnglishText: An unexpectedly fashionable man who cares about his appearance.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>夢のフォルス<White> 「制御できる夢」全ミッションを クリアした剛の者。
Entry.EnglishText: A title for those strong enough to have completed all of the Lucid Dreaming missions of the <Yellow>Force of Dreams<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 旅とは、自らの知識と 自らの心を広げるものでもある。
Entry.EnglishText: Traveling expands both one's knowledge and one's mind.

Entry.JapaneseText: 忠臣
Entry.EnglishText: Loyal Subject

Entry.JapaneseText: 「王家への忠誠心が 俺を歩ませる……」
Entry.EnglishText: "My loyalty to the royal family is what keeps me going..."

Entry.JapaneseText: 法陣師
Entry.EnglishText: Ritualist

Entry.JapaneseText: 大杖によって地面に円陣を描き、 その円陣の加護によって様々な効果を得る。
Entry.EnglishText: She uses her staff to draw circles on the earth, which confer various blessings.

Entry.JapaneseText: 仇討ちの少女
Entry.EnglishText: Vengeful Girl

Entry.JapaneseText: 王宮付きの医師であった父を 殺害した犯人を追い求めて、 仇を討とうとしている少女。
Entry.EnglishText: A girl who seeks revenge against the one who murdered her father, who was the royal physician.

Entry.JapaneseText: 女医志望
Entry.EnglishText: Aspiring Medic

Entry.JapaneseText: 亡き父の跡を継ぎ、医師の道を志す少女。
Entry.EnglishText: A girl who aspires to follow in her late father's footsteps by becoming a doctor.

Entry.JapaneseText: 論理的に事件を解決！ それが、名探偵。
Entry.EnglishText: You've used logic to solve the case! Talk about being a great detective.

Entry.JapaneseText: 怖がり
Entry.EnglishText: Scaredy-Cat

Entry.JapaneseText: 怖い話に弱い女子。
Entry.EnglishText: A girl who can't handle scary stories well.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマ嫌い
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma Hater

Entry.JapaneseText: 何らかの理由によって、ガジュマに対して 嫌悪感を持っている。
Entry.EnglishText: For whatever reason, she harbors feelings of contempt towards Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: ナイスウェイトレス
Entry.EnglishText: Skilled Waitress

Entry.JapaneseText: 酒場で良い働きをした証。 あわてず、こぼさず、素敵な笑顔。
Entry.EnglishText: A title for those who worked well at the bar. No panicking, no spilling, just put on a beautiful smile.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミス・パーフェクト
Entry.EnglishText: Miss Perfect

Entry.JapaneseText: 旅における出会い…… それは、人と人とは限らない。 道に咲く一輪の花さえも出会いである。
Entry.EnglishText: People aren't the only thing you'll find on a journey. Even a single flower blooming on the road is an encounter.

Entry.JapaneseText: 評論家
Entry.EnglishText: Art Critic

Entry.JapaneseText: 評論家とは、単純な感動を 複雑な言葉で表現する者。
Entry.EnglishText: A critic is one who expresses simple emotions with complex words.

Entry.JapaneseText: 格闘弓士
Entry.EnglishText: Martial Archer

Entry.JapaneseText: 近距離では自らの身体を武器とする格闘家。 遠距離では腕に取り付けたボウガンを射つ マルチクラス。
Entry.EnglishText: A versatile fighter who uses martial arts for close-range combat and switches to his crossbow for long-range.

Entry.JapaneseText: 製鉄工場従業員
Entry.EnglishText: Iron Factory Employee

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカにある製鉄工場で働く青年。
Entry.EnglishText: A young man who works at the iron factory in Petnadjanka.

Entry.JapaneseText: 姉想い
Entry.EnglishText: Brotherly Love
Entry.Notes: apparently this one is also in symphonia (i never get it oops)

Entry.JapaneseText: 「姉貴には、かなわないんだよなぁ……」
Entry.EnglishText: "Man, I'll never be as great as my sister..."

Entry.JapaneseText: 料理好き
Entry.EnglishText: Likes to Cook

Entry.JapaneseText: 「おれの料理の腕前は、まさに五つ星だぜ！ おれのスペシャル料理で ほっぺた落ちてもしらねーぞ！」
Entry.EnglishText: "My cooking skills are worth Five Stars! My special recipes are sure to make your mouth water!"

Entry.JapaneseText: ××料理人
Entry.EnglishText: Terrible Cook

Entry.JapaneseText: 間違って、みんなに毒キノコを食わせた汚名。 ちなみに、挽回するのは名誉。 汚名は返上するもの。
Entry.EnglishText: He ruined his reputation by accidentally feeding his friends poisonous mushrooms.

Entry.JapaneseText: エコロジスト
Entry.EnglishText: Tree-Hugger

Entry.JapaneseText: 「ヒトは自然から試練を受け、 自然とともに歩み、自然に助けられる。 それが、おれの主義だ」
Entry.EnglishText: "Man is tested by nature, Man walks alongside nature, Man is helped by nature. That's my philosophy."

Entry.JapaneseText: 通い慣れた道を外れて、 通った事のない道を通ってみる。 それだけで、ひとつの旅である。
Entry.EnglishText: He abandoned his old path in favour of something new. That was a journey in itself.

Entry.JapaneseText: 真正料理人
Entry.EnglishText: Genuine Cook

Entry.JapaneseText: 真正？ 真性!? ……とにかく 料理が好きなことに変わりはない。
Entry.EnglishText: Actual? Perhaps factual?! ...Well, there's no doubt that he loves to cook.

Entry.JapaneseText: おお！ おお、その名は…… 熱血！ 闘魂！ バニーハンター・<Tytree>！
Entry.EnglishText: Ooh! What a title... Hot-blooded with fighting spirit! Give it up for <Tytree>, the Bunny Hunter!

Entry.JapaneseText: 料理の師匠
Entry.EnglishText: Master of Cooking

Entry.JapaneseText: クチうるさいが料理にもうるさい。
Entry.EnglishText: Whether he's cooking or talking, you can always expect a mouthful from him!
Entry.Notes: fucking dajare Talkative クチうるさい and good at cooking 料理にもうるさい

Entry.JapaneseText: 迷探偵
Entry.EnglishText: Great Defective

Entry.JapaneseText: いつの間にやら事件が解決？ それが、迷探偵……
Entry.EnglishText: Will he ever solve the case? I guess that's why he's a defective...

Entry.JapaneseText: 術使い。 <Yellow>雷のフォルス<White>から力を得た術を使う。
Entry.EnglishText: A magic user. She casts spells using her <Yellow>Force of Lightning<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: 占い師
Entry.EnglishText: Fortune Teller

Entry.JapaneseText: 占い師。 手にしたカードで占星術をおこなう。 全ては星の導き。
Entry.EnglishText: She reads the future with her cards using guidance from the stars.

Entry.JapaneseText: ハーフ
Entry.EnglishText: Half

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとガジュマのハーフ。 外見はヒューマに見えるが、角と尾がある。
Entry.EnglishText: A Half born from Huma and Gajuma. Though she may pass as Huma, she has horns and a tail.

Entry.JapaneseText: 元・王の盾
Entry.EnglishText: Former Royal Shield

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>王の盾<White>に所属していたが、裏切った女性。 「裏切ったわけじゃないわ…… 表返ったのよ……」
Entry.EnglishText: A woman who betrayed the Royal Shield. "I didn't betray them... I just turned my back on them..."
Entry.Notes: this is a reference 裏切ったんじゃない。表返ったのだ jidaigeki ass line if I find another translation I will replace

Entry.JapaneseText: 孤独を知る女
Entry.EnglishText: Lonely Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: 人は傷ついた分だけ 他人にやさしくできるもの……
Entry.EnglishText: They say the more that one is hurt, the kinder they are to others...

Entry.JapaneseText: 酒好き
Entry.EnglishText: Likes to Drink

Entry.JapaneseText: 「疲れた時の一杯は最高ね……」
Entry.EnglishText: "There's nothing better than a good drink when you're tired..."

Entry.JapaneseText: 酒場で良い働きをした証。 あわてず、こぼさず、エレガントに。
Entry.EnglishText: A title for those who worked well at the bar. No panicking, no spilling, just be as elegant as possible.

Entry.JapaneseText: 旅の中で、自分を見つめ、自分自身の真実を 探し求める……それもまた旅路。
Entry.EnglishText: During your travels you can look for yourself and discover your truth... That in itself is a journey.

Entry.JapaneseText: チェロ奏者
Entry.EnglishText: Cellist

Entry.JapaneseText: 本人いわく、チェロを演奏させれば なかなかのものらしい。
Entry.EnglishText: According to her, her cello skills are quite impressive.

Entry.JapaneseText: 村娘
Entry.EnglishText: Village Girl

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズに住んでいた村娘。 ヒューマの中でも美しい容姿を持つ。
Entry.EnglishText: A village girl who grew up in Sulz. She was the most beautiful out of all the Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: さらわれた娘
Entry.EnglishText: Kidnapped Girl

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>王の盾<White>によって誘拐された娘。
Entry.EnglishText: A girl who was kidnapped by the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>の家族
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>'s Family

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>と家族同然に育った おさななじみ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>'s childhood friend who was raised in the same household.

Entry.JapaneseText: 入れ替わった女性
Entry.EnglishText: Out-of-Body Experience

Entry.JapaneseText: 身体はクレアだが、精神はアガーテ女王。
Entry.EnglishText: Though the body belongs to Claire, the spirit inside is Agarte.

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王
Entry.EnglishText: Queen

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギアの女王。 先代のラドラス王が崩御したことによって、 王位を継承した。
Entry.EnglishText: The Queen of Callegea. She succeeded the throne after the death of her father, King Ladras.

Entry.JapaneseText: 術使い。 <Yellow>月のフォルス<White>を持つ。 クレアの姿となった今は使う事ができない。
Entry.EnglishText: A magic user. She has the <Yellow>Force of Moon<White>. However, since she has been in Claire's body she is unable to use it.

Entry.JapaneseText: 目覚めた女王
Entry.EnglishText: Awakened Queen

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマやガジュマといった外見の違いに とらわれていた自分を見つめ直し、 目を覚ましつつある女性。
Entry.EnglishText: A woman who now realizes she was obsessed with the outward differences between Huma and Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: 誇り高き旅人
Entry.EnglishText: Proud Traveler

Entry.JapaneseText: 今まで自分が知らなかった世界を巡る事で 数多くの人々や出来事を見聞し、 考えや行動を変えつつある女性。
Entry.EnglishText: Now free to travel the world, she has experienced new people and situations and begun to change her beliefs.

Entry.JapaneseText: ゴージャスレディー
Entry.EnglishText: Gorgeous Lady

Entry.JapaneseText: ゴージャスなドレスに感動する女性。
Entry.EnglishText: A lady who wears a gorgeous dress.

Entry.JapaneseText: 術使い。 <Yellow>月のフォルス<White>を持つ。 その真の能力は謎につつまれている。
Entry.EnglishText: A magic user. She has the <Yellow>Force of Moon<White>. The true powers of her Force remain a mystery.

Entry.JapaneseText: 謎の女性
Entry.EnglishText: Mysterious Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: 何らかの思惑を秘めている謎の女性。
Entry.EnglishText: A woman with some sort of hidden agenda.

Entry.JapaneseText: 身体はアガーテ女王だが、精神はクレア。
Entry.EnglishText: Though the body belongs to Agarte, the spirit inside is Claire.

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズに住んでいた村娘。
Entry.EnglishText: A girl who lived in Sulz.

Entry.JapaneseText: 演説者
Entry.EnglishText: Voice of Reason

Entry.JapaneseText: 心に種族の差などない事を訴えて 聴衆の心を打った。
Entry.EnglishText: She touched the hearts of the audience by appealing to them that the heart knows not racial discrimination.

Entry.JapaneseText: 純朴な娘
Entry.EnglishText: Plain Girl

Entry.JapaneseText: 織物職人の気持ちを思い、 感動する女性。
Entry.EnglishText: A woman who was moved by the thoughts and feelings of the weavers.
